reviews.review: Honestly it is just hours of fun.
Many hackers still lingered around. Waiting for VAC wave is like waiting for disaster to happened.

Amazing game! Very fun and easy to play with friends.
One suggestion, possibly make it so that you have to play a certain amount of hours in casual before you can play competitive. It does get quite annoying when you have to verse total noobs ;/

Played since 2014 and its the best competitive shooter out there.

One of the few games that the game is not broken every update, (and when it is it's still fun to play for me). It genuinely takes skill so hardwork and determination are neccesary. You will get smurfs and bad teamates, but life goes on. One of the games every gamer should own.
